text: what makes Cisco unique is we are the
world's largest food service distributor
we're probably the only global food
service distributor that's working
across many countries and many
continents we are a very high volume low
margin business so time is literally
money we can't afford to have issues and
challenges with technology we have got
to be product moving our IT environment
before we move to the cloud was probably
similar to a lot of other big companies
we've had a heavily outsourced
organization from an IT perspective we
also had a number of legacy applications
that have been running for years and
years and years from a technology
standpoint our biggest challenge has
always been always on always available
our ability to scale globally it was
very important and at the end of the day
I think the biggest thing was our
ability to innovate and find a partner
that was innovative with us AWS was
clearly the most innovative
our corporate systems are probably 20
years old the issues that we were facing
was it was on old brittle technology and
it was falling over a lot causing real
business problems we have moved probably
50% of our workloads out of our data
centers in teh AWS we chose AWS for our
windows-based
workload because of its scalability
reliability we were in need to migrate
off of Server 2003 we chose AWS as the
platform to migrate from Server 2003 to
Windows Server 2012 the AWS account team
and entire AWS partner community was
instrumental in the success of that
migration they brought the right people
to the table they brought architects
engineers and really made it a very
smooth transition in migration we have
taken applications and workloads that
have been unstable in the past and ended
our ability to be always on always
available we have moved them to AWS I've
gained incredible stability incredible
performance gains we now have agile
teams who can requisition their own
hardware and their own hosting without
having to get handoffs with
infrastructure teams involved in it
which just helps our speed to market
tremendously
we now have applications that are in
modern technologies where we can be
to refactor them and modernize them
which we couldn't before as a chief
technology officer AWS does make your
job easier we're sort of out of the
hosting business and we're using our
energy and our time and our focus now to
create business applications that are
going to help us win with our customers
and win in the marketplace and that is a
great trade-off
you
